Entries.WizardGingerTinctureQuest: I would ask you to visit me as soon as possible. We have a very important matter to discuss...   ^   -M. Rasmodius, Wizard%item quest 1810912352 true %%[#]Wizard's Invite
Entries.WizardGingerTinctureSeeds: Greetings, adept.^I have finished my experiments with specimens you brought. Turns out there's not so much magic potential, I think it cannot preserve mana well because of void essense contained in the soil in which it grew... I have enclosed in this package the leftover seeds. Use it wisely.   ^    -M. Rasmodius, Wizard %item id {{ModId}}_Vile_Ancient_Fruit_Seeds 3 %%%item id {{ModId}}_Void_Mint_Seeds 3 %%[#]Seeds From the Wizard
Entries.AlectoGingerTinctureSeeds: Hello sweetie < ^ Just wanted to say thanks for helping with those fertilizers... Even though they didn't do anything, but it's not your fault. ^^ P.S. I hope Kevin didn't eat all the seeds while delivering the letter!   ^    -Alecto %item id {{ModId}}_Vile_Ancient_Fruit_Seeds 3 %%%item id {{ModId}}_Void_Mint_Seeds 3 %%[#]Alecto's Gift
Entries.GoblincookingPotGot: ...don't mind me i'm just random useless letter used for some quest to work...

Entries.1810912351: Basic/Witch's order/Witch asked to bring a good quality fertilizer for her crops... a really high quality one!/Put 10 Deluxe Fertilizers in witch's basket./-1/-1/0/-1/false
Entries.1810912352: Basic/Wizard's Invite/Wizard wants to talk to you about some very important matter.../Visit Wizard at his tower./-1/-1/0/-1/false
Entries.1810912353: Basic/Corrupted Crops Task/Wizard asked to bring him some crop specimens from Witch's garden for his research... He also asked for high quality fertilizers./Collect some crops from Witch's Swamp garden./-1/-1/0/-1/false
Entries.1810912354: Basic/Corrupted Crops Task/Wizard asked to bring him some crop specimens from Witch's garden for his research.. He also asked for high quality fertilizers./Bring Wizard 10 Deluxe Fertilizers./-1/-1/0/-1/false
Entries.1810912355: Basic/A New Pot/Goblin asked you to help with getting a new cooking pot./Talk with townsfolk./-1/-1/0/-1/false
Entries.1810912356: Basic/A New Pot/Goblin asked you to help with getting a new cooking pot./Bring new cooking pot to Goblin./-1/-1/0/-1/false
Entries.1810912357: Basic/A New Pot/Clint agreed to forge a new pot for Goblin, he just needs materials for work./Bring Clint 5 Iron bars./-1/-1/0/-1/false
Entries.1810912358: Basic/Fancy Blancet Task/Goblin needs something warm to wear... Maybe Emily can help with making a warm blanket?/Visit Emily in her house./-1/-1/0/-1/false
Entries.1810912359: Basic/Fancy Blancet Task/Goblin needs something warm to wear... Emily can sew a warm blanket, but she needs the materials first./Bring Emily 5 Wool and 5 Cloth./-1/-1/0/-1/false
Entries.1810912360: Basic/Fancy Blancet Task/Emily made a warm blanket! It's time to bring it to Goblin./Return to Goblin./-1/-1/0/-1/false
